suite.name: Crm

test.name: Should be able to add new customer

kw.name: Begin Test
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

This keyword initializes the test environment by opening a browser, navigating to the specified URL, and setting up Selenium configurations. It is typically used at the beginning of a test case to prepare the test environment.

kw.name: Login
Verify Landing Page Is Loaded
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

This keyword waits until the landing page contains the specified headline text, verifying that the page has loaded correctly. It ensures the user is on the correct landing page before proceeding with any other actions.

kw.name: Sign In
Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
This keyword performs the action of clicking on the sign-in link and then waits until the login page is displayed. It navigates the user from the landing page to the login page.

kw.name: Fill Login Details
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select Checkbox
kw.doc: Selects the checkbox identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
This keyword fills in the login details on the login page, including the email, password, and an optional 'Remember Me' checkbox. It then submits the login form by clicking the submit button.
Logs into the application. This involves verifying that the landing page is loaded, clicking the sign-in link, and filling in the login details.

kw.name: View Customers List
View Customer List
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
This Keyword waits until the homepage headline is present to verify the customers list page is loaded.
Navigates to the customers list page by ensuring the page is correctly loaded.

kw.name: Add New Customer
Click Add Customer Button
Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
This Keyword click the button to add a new customer and wait until the add customer page is loaded.
Clicks the button to add a new customer and waits for the add customer page to load.

kw.name: Fill Customer Details
Fill cusotmer details
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'StateOrRegion' by value AK.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Select Radio Button
kw.doc: Sets the radio button group ``group_name`` to ``value``.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Select Checkbox
kw.doc: Selects the checkbox identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

This Keyword fills in the customer details form with the provided information and submits the form. This includes entering the customerâ€™s email, first name, last name, city, state or region, and gender. It also involves selecting the checkbox to add the customer to the promotional list and submitting the form. [Tags] AddCustomer FormSubmission
Fills out the form to add a new customer with the provided details and submits the form.

kw.name: Sign Out
Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: User Signed Out
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

This keyword verifies that the user has been successfully signed out by checking for the presence of a sign-out confirmation message on the page. It ensures that the sign-out process was completed successfully.
Signs out of the application and verifies that the user has been signed out.

kw.name: End Test
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

This keyword performs the teardown actions for a test case, including closing the browser and pausing briefly to ensure that all actions are properly completed. It is typically used at the end of a test case to clean up the test environment.

test.doc: This test case verifies that a user can successfully add a new customer. The test includes logging in, navigating to the customer list, adding a new customer, and verifying the addition.

suite.doc: This suite tests the CRM application functionality, including user login, customer management, and sign out. It uses SeleniumLibrary to interact with the web application.
